text: I want to know so much more about this. <http://www.runnersworld.com/races/tomato-dispensing-device-will-debut-at-tokyo-marathon>

attachments.title: Tomato-Dispensing Device Will Debut at Tokyo Marathon
attachments.text: Move over, Gu-lugging belts. Japanese juice-maker Kagome revealed a new fueling device ahead of this weekend's Tokyo Marathon. Dubbed the "Tomatan," the hands-free backpack with robotic arms totes six tomatoes and brings them close to the wearer's mouth for refueling during a race.
attachments.fallback: Runner's World & Running Times: Tomato-Dispensing Device Will Debut at Tokyo Marathon
